author: Cat Saver
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
content: After reading reviews of other Amazon customers, I felt comfortable in ordering these earrings for myself.  But what I failed to notice is that the negative reviews seemed to increase, starting around November 2020, and continuing to the present time.  And not to be overlooked is that numerous negative reviews described the same complaints and dissatisfaction with the quality and comfort that I experienced with my own pair.  The stems were rough and actually irritated my ears as I put them on, and the "locking device" was way too tight, and way too small.  Once I put the earrings on, I couldn't wait to take them off because of the immediate discomfort they caused.  In all the years I have worn pierced earrings, I have NEVER had these, or any other similar issues.  Yesterday the earrings were returned to Amazon, and  needless to say, I definitely would not recommend them.

author: S.W.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2024
content: Overall great casual jacket. Got it on sale for $9. Fits true to size. Arm length cuts right at my wrist and ends right at my hips. Jacket feels sturdy and should hopefully last a few years of wear easily. Material is soft and warm. I am more on the warm side usually and tend to only put jackets on when weather dips below 65F. I would say this jacket would keep me warm by itself without another layer in weather no colder than 50 degrees. If I’m waking and the weather is anything lower I’ll probably throw a sweatshirt on underneath. Overall I recommend this jacket, especially for the price I got it for!

author: Mowrind
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2017
content: Pros: Comfortable, affordable, not undersized. Currently available in tan, which is strangely hard to find in other full zip fleece jackets right now.Cons: Sheds fuzz like crazy. Makes me doubt its durability, though so far it's holding up. Using Columbia Steens Mountain as a baseline, it's heavier than I expected. A bit too warm indoors. The currently trendy cuffless sleeve design is also an annoyance. I'll willingly pay a bit more for the Columbia next time.Edit: After two or three wash cycles now, the fuzz ball shedding issue seems to be going away.Update: a couple of months later, as I feared, visible signs of wear. Elbows are shiny. I have to conclude the product is not a good value even at its well-below-average price.

content: I’m not reviewing the fleece based on performance.... but just writing this to help if women go to purchase this fleece. I need a red/red tone fleece for work. The women fleece have Red and a Maroon one but with blue trim.... which I feel looks tacky. So I opted for the men’s fleece. The fleece itself feels nice and decent quality. Mid weight. In womens i normally buy a large- for a little room. I purchased medium in the men’s. The hips and torso fit like a large. Doesn’t contour but I didn’t expect that in the men’s sizing. Anyway the arms are sooooooooo wide. Not a good look. Or rather not the look I’m going for. I feel they are wider than I normally see. So I’m not saying this is a bad fleece in any way. But for me doesn’t work and I’ll be returning.

author: Adam
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2021
content: I buy hiking gear, and I'm discerning. I'll buy inexpensive, but never cheap. I tend to notice details others might miss, which makes the difference between the two. This jacket was not only inexpensive, but one of those times when the stars align. In short, I paid $12 for it. But here's where the distinction between inexpensive and cheap makes all the difference. Something I look for in a garment with zippers are three letters: YKK. The best hiking gear brands use YKK zippers. Not only does this Amazon Essentials jacket use them, but other garments they offer, as well. That one detail makes me comfortable that they have paid similar attention to the rest of the details. The fleece is dense, even luxurious, and after a couple of washes, pilling is at a minimum. It's a really nice, simple, fire engine red. Inside pockets are another plus, large enough to fit a small tablet, gloves, or a sandwich. To this point, you might be wondering, "Three stars? Sounds like you love it!" Well, so with people as with clothing, you start to find flaws. First, while it otherwise fits well, it's two inches too long; it almost covers my inseam. The collar acts weird. It doesn't look or feel right with the collar up, but pulled down flat, it looks and feels fine. I just don't enjoy wearing that way. Those peccadilloes aside, it's a quality garment that I wish I could have given four stars. I typically only give five stars for products that saved my life. Had this one done everything I wanted, it would gotten a strong four. Why didn't I return it? It's a nice jacket with a couple of flaws for $12.

author: Julian
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
content: This jacket is a pretty outstanding value, even though it’s more than I needed. I purchased three in hopes that they were lighter—more like a top to wear over a t-shirt. As a fleece, this is pretty heavy, like a light coat. The tail comes down to mid butt and the sleeves are perfect—just a tad long on my average arms. At 5’9” and 155, I almost always wear small and these smalls fit with room to easily wear a couple base layers or a sweatshirt underneath. Not as soft as I was hoping for—again, was thinking more of a top, not a coat—but reasonably soft for a jacket. Looks just fine. Was at an outdoor sports store and compared this to a Patagonia offering that was very similar in quality and feel. Zippers all work just fine. The bonus inner pockets do (inexplicably!) have holes in them large enough to lose your AirPods case, but good for larger things like hat, gloves, trail map, or cell phone. I wore one over a wool tshirt for a mountain hike. 30 degrees with 15 mph winds in the Boulder Flatirons. Overall just a little chilly after working up my body heat during a 2 hour hike.  I didn’t really need any more jackets but made room in the rotation for these. Smoking deal for what I paid!

content: The jacket fits fine and looks great, though the feel of the fabric is clearly of a lower quality than my Mountain Hardware and Patagonia fleeces.  I use the later fleeces for mountaineering and backpacking, and typically as mid layers under shells as they were originally intended for.  But as we all wear these around town, I wanted one I could keep clean (no mountain use residue or odor), and one in black.I like the jacket, but the zipper has opened from the bottom three times now, out of maybe 30 uses.  It's not hard to fix,  but I've never had a fleece zipper, or any jacket zipper for that matter, be so poorly anchored.  1-star off for the zipper and less than top-quality material, but 4-stars fro great fit and look. and

author: ChaunceyRat
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
content: I purchased this jacket in hunter green for myself.  I have a really long torso and usually order a mens tall in jackets like this.  I was excited this fleece arrived so quickly but knew as soon as I opened it that it was too long.  It was so long it ended up being only a few inches above my knees and the arms were not only extremely long, but also huge.  I was going to return this and order a smaller size in regular length but it is unavailable in the hunter green.  I ended up returning for a refund and purchasing a different brand that fit perfectly.  It's a bummer because this jacket is a good weight and the perfect color, but the sizing was a little too off for me.

author: DJL
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
content: It's soft, relatively light, and warm. I planned to use it as an under-layer on bike rides, but now find that it is also quite comfortable to wear while puttering around indoors.The sizing makes no sense. Amazon displayed "large will fit you best", but large was hopelessly long and baggy. The one I'm wearing in the picture is a medium size, which is comfortable but still a little too long for use with an outer shell-type bicycling jacket. I also purchased a small in a different color (forest green), but it is slightly tight in the stomach -- and still too long!The camo colored one (medium size) is made in Vietnam. The forest green (small size) one is from Indonesia, and seems slightly less soft.

author: Mia Cornelius

content: Okay. So this one is on me.I was looking for a light fleece type jacket to combat these chilly little Florida winters…this fit the bill! I purposely ordered it in a big and tall so it would be roomie, because I like my jackets to have some wiggle room and I want them to cover my butt.What I did not anticipate, however, was that the T in Tall would mean TALL. T. A. L. L. Big boy, dunking on Lebron, could fit five people in here kinda tall.So I guess technically, it’s roomie and it covers my butt. My wants were met. And then some.Tried shrinking it in the wash; can say that it does not shrink! So maybe that’s a nice feature.To be fair, it is a great jacket. Light weight yet warm fleece! Just know that the big and tall size means bigger and taller.

content: Overall great casual jacket. Got it on sale for $9. Fits true to size. Arm length cuts right at my wrist and ends right at my hips. Jacket feels sturdy and should hopefully last a few years of wear easily. Material is soft and warm. I am more on the warm side usually and tend to only put jackets on when weather dips below 65F. I would say this jacket would keep me warm by itself without another layer in weather no colder than 50 degrees. If I’m waking and the weather is anything lower I’ll probably throw a sweatshirt on underneath. Overall I recommend this jacket, especially for the price I got it for!

author: Kindle Reader
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
content: This jacket is exactly what I wanted. I work Search and Rescue where there can be periods of hurry up (heat up) and wait (get chilled). If you’re out for 24hrs, the temperatures can swing widely. Layers are absolutely essential. While I would not consider this material to be well suited for moving through dense brush, it’s durable enough to pull in and out of a pack repeatedly and perfect for a warm layer under a light wind breaker, rain gear or ski jacket. It could be worn indoors as a warm up layer like you would wear a soft fleece hoodie. I would consider the material to be medium weight.I like my layers trim fitting when possible yet not restrictive, so at 5’ 10” tall, 170lbs (no belly), I bought a Medium. It’s a perfect fit. I’m a little long in the waist and the arms, but the medium rests mid hip and the sleeves just cover my wrists well.Zippers seem sturdy enough. I like the inside pouch pockets for keeping maps and other paper forms. They don’t have a lot of structural rigidity, but are ideal for envelopes and alike. All things considered, this jacket is perfect for my intended use.

author: JS
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2020
content: I'm not sure I have written a review on Amazon before but felt compelled to write on for this fleece. When you see such an incredible price (especially on Prime day) coupled with the fact that there are so many 5 star reviews, you are compelled to see what the fuss is all about. And i have to say, this fleece does not disappoint!When you take it out of the bag, it looks like any other ordinary fleece, but when you try it on, it all makes sense as to why it received such high reviews:1. This is a very warm fleece. Do not let the lightness (weight) fool you! I've been using this during October in New England and so, right now the temperature hovers around 60ish degrees. This jacket is very warm. so much so that i get hot in it so i suspect it will do quite well as the temperature gets cooler. I would not recommend only this for winter, but it will do quite nicely layered.2. This is a great fitting fleece. I am 5'6, 140ish and closer to a slim fit and the XS sized fleece fits like a glove! I've always had trouble finding items that fit me. The closest is Uniqlo with their extra small, but their sleeves and length are rather short. This one has the perfect sleeve length as well as jacket length.3. The price. i mentioned this earlier but its worth mentioning again. I've also purchased a north face fleece and while that one is certainly thicker, in terms of warmth, this is only a little bit less warm. So the value for this fleece is incredible.All in all, I am very happy with it. I ordered one for my father and he was quite surprised and impressed with quality relative to the price. Nice job Amazon!

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
content: I live it what is considered a 'southern' state, but  that doesn't mean it doesn't get cold here. Some days in the winter months it can be 60 degrees F, and other days, it can go to 20. Who knows. But this jacket helps so much because I use it under another jacket when it's cold, or by itself when it's not so bad.It's fleece, so it's pretty soft and comfortable. I really like the big inside pockets, the big outside pockets, and how it zips up to keep my neck warm. Overall, it's just a nice jacket. I did have to trim some threads on it, but it was well worth the price.

author: Ashley Brooks
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
content: I’m a woman, but I love wearing men’s casual clothes because they tend to be longer and have actual functioning pockets!I originally bought the burgundy fleece in it large last year. I rarely needed anything heavier in our mild South Carolina winters, but when I did, the fleece fit easily even under a pea coat. It is still in like-new condition over a year later.The one issue I had was that men’s clothes are not necessarily designed to fit our curves, so while I enjoyed the longer length, the bottom was tight around my butt.So this year, I ordered extra larges in brown, green, and buffalo plaid. The plaid material is extremely soft and comfortable, even after being washed. The others are also very soft and warm, and I love the two tone design of the green jacket.They are a little big for me in the body (but fit my derrière well), but I like the oversized look, and they fit under winter coats. The only real issue I had was that the inner pockets and outer pockets were not divided in the new jackets, whereas they were in the one I ordered last year. However, stitching the seem on the inside was a relatively easy solution.Overall, I would recommend these fleeces to anyone who is considering buying them. Especially at these prices, I will definitely be getting more!

author: Privacy
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
content: This company uses different manufacturers that are located in various countries. The product I received had a tag that said, "Made in Guatemala." I avoid buying clothing made in Guatemala since apparel made in that country are notorious for sub standard quality. Had I known the seller sources apparel made in that country, I would not have ordered from this label. It is hit or miss. You take your chances and get a fabulous product made in France, Italy, Spain, or the U.S. or you get a sub standard product made in Guatemala or different parts of China, Nicaragua, and Mexico (some manufacturers in Mexico are excellent and good, some are shoddy).The color was a dark mauve, looked faded and was nothing like the photo. I felt depressed looking at it. The zipper does not zip up smoothly, it catches because the quality is very poor. This was the first time I ordered an Amazon Essential product, and it could be my last. It would take something substantial to regain my trust to try this brand again.

author: Ariel
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2024
content: This fleece jacket has several flaws.  #1 It is not sized correctly.  I wear a 1X consistently with Land's End, Woman Within, Nordstroms and other stores/brands.  If I want to go big and baggy I get a 2X for example in a hoodie.  I ordered a 3X in the Amazon Essentials fleece jacket because I remember from experience that Amazon Essentials runs small.  The jacket just barely fits.  It also rides up the back and ends up sitting at waist length.  It falls around the mid rear or above.  If you are looking for cover go elsewhere.  #2 The fabric is just okay.  It is not as soft as the brands listed.  It has a foamy feel to the fleece.  #3 The sleeves are a bit short.  Again I ordered 2 sizes up so hate to see what a jacket in my size would fit like.  I got it on sale for $10.00 so I will wear it and not return it as I can get some wear out it, but it will not be my go to for comfort or fit.  A 3X would be too big for me in other brands.  Again this one barely fit.  Amazon, if you are listening you need work done on your Essential brand in all the areas mentioned.  The one thing that is making me keep it is the color - its a very pretty violet and since it fits good enough I'll keep it for what I paid.  I would not pay full price for this.  You can get a much better fit and quality elsewhere.

author: M
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
content: Basic warm fleece fabric.  Jacket seems well constructed and well sewn, and the zippers seem to be good quality.  The sleeves have a thin polyester binding to hem/finish them instead of a cuff or thicker elastic. It fits a little close to the body while still allowing room for movement, so it looks neat and feminine. (Size up if you want a roomy, boxier fit.) I’m 5’4” 118 lbs 34” chest 28” waist 34” hip and size small fits me really well over a long sleeve top.  I’m glad I purchased this fleece during a good sale, because while it is well sewn, I think for what it is the regular price is too high.  Good layering piece for the cold.Update/edit  5/26/23Since late December, I wore this fleece several days per week (like a sweater), machine washed on cold every week or two and hung to dry (never used the dryer). After five months of frequent use and washing, the fleece looks terrible. The elbows are wearing through, and the fabric is weirded discolored on the arms, I guess from frequent movement — like the fleece is more worn away in lines (if you know what “whisker wash” in jeans legs are, that’s similar to what the arms of my fleece look like now).  It is only wearable in the house and for yard chores now it looks so awful. The zippers are all still in great shape, but the quality of fleece used was obviously terrible. I would not buy this fleece again.

As certified by

author: Amazon Customer
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
content: Initially I ordered a 3x in a brown buffalo plaid.  I am 5'3", 234 lbs, 46C bra.  Since this looked a little fitted I thought that would work but it was too big and sloppy looking so I returned (no problem) and ordered this print and heather blue.  Both fit perfect.  The sleeves are a bit long but not enough to have to roll.  This is thick enough so it does not sink into rolls or show lumps.  Layering is a must in Wisconsin in my opinion so I was not looking for super heavy but something different than a hooded sweatshirt or cardigan.  It is perfect inside a place that is chilly but not enough to leave my jacket on.  On the other hand it works when someplace is so warm I would be uncomfortable leaving this on also so I can take it off and just be in a short or long sleeve tee.  I wore it on a sunny day over a tee and in the upper 30's to go in and out of stores and was comfortable but would not have spent too much time outside this way.  If you want something heavy to replace a winter coat in a cold climate, this is not it ,but if you want something that looks nice enough to wear anywhere and look a little dressier this is nice.  In the picture I am wearing a t shirt under the jacket and have plenty of room to feel comfortable and not stuffed in.  I have wide shoulders, heavy arms and a tummy and this is no problem.  I can wear a long sleeve tee or shirt under but would not put anything heavier under or this fit would be too snug for my taste.  This dips in slightly at the waist and out again at the hips.  The fabric is soft and the zippers seem very sturdy.  It is nice to have zippered pockets.  I have had compliments on this jacket on me.  I did not take pictures of the heather blue one but the fit is the same.  I also washed these in cold water, delicate dry with no shrinkage or seam puckering.  They had a very slight dye odor and the wash took care of that.  The picture is after it was washed.  I must say the brown buffalo print in 3x that I initially ordered seemed to be a little lighter weight so don't know if there is a difference in colors ordered but the 2 I got were as expected.

date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2024
content: This jacket is great. I have actually purchased six of these—each a different color or pattern. I wear them all year around. I like that the pockets zip shut and that there isn’t a hood (that I never use).  They Keep you warm without making you hot.  They are very easy to wash. I toss mine in the washer on warm and hang them up to dry.  Since I keep buying them, yes, I highly recommend them.

content: This is a great fleece jacket. The small size I purchased fits my 5'2" petite/small size frame perfectly. The feel of the  fleece fabric is a soft medium weight. With that stated the price on this fleece seemingly fluctuates with the color you buy, which is a downside. And for that reason I rated 4 stars instead of 5. content: I ordered two of these, one in pink and one in teal blue. The pink one has sleeves which are a half an inch shorter than the one in teal blue. The teal blue is more green in person than I would have expected from the picture on the website which made it look more blue.I am 5'9" tall and a 3X, and I often find that if I want to have sleeves be long enough to keep me warm all the way to my wrists, I need to order a men's size. But the women's sizes have more color options I prefer (usually, as sometimes the colors are limited when the size range moves into the plus sizes). I was initially excited to see so many different colors available in my size when I got these, as I was seriously considering having to sew my own when I was shopping for these.Also, I was surprised the fit was somewhat snug for a 3X. I do have some fleece from other manufacturers in a 2X that fit about the same as this 3X.  I am somewhat concerned about it shrinking if I put it in the dryer, but I haven't washed and dried it yet.

author: Amazon Customer
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
content: Initially I ordered a 3x in a brown buffalo plaid.  I am 5'3", 234 lbs, 46C bra.  Since this looked a little fitted I thought that would work but it was too big and sloppy looking so I returned (no problem) and ordered this print and heather blue.  Both fit perfect.  The sleeves are a bit long but not enough to have to roll.  This is thick enough so it does not sink into rolls or show lumps.  Layering is a must in Wisconsin in my opinion so I was not looking for super heavy but something different than a hooded sweatshirt or cardigan.  It is perfect inside a place that is chilly but not enough to leave my jacket on.  On the other hand it works when someplace is so warm I would be uncomfortable leaving this on also so I can take it off and just be in a short or long sleeve tee.  I wore it on a sunny day over a tee and in the upper 30's to go in and out of stores and was comfortable but would not have spent too much time outside this way.  If you want something heavy to replace a winter coat in a cold climate, this is not it ,but if you want something that looks nice enough to wear anywhere and look a little dressier this is nice.  In the picture I am wearing a t shirt under the jacket and have plenty of room to feel comfortable and not stuffed in.  I have wide shoulders, heavy arms and a tummy and this is no problem.  I can wear a long sleeve tee or shirt under but would not put anything heavier under or this fit would be too snug for my taste.  This dips in slightly at the waist and out again at the hips.  The fabric is soft and the zippers seem very sturdy.  It is nice to have zippered pockets.  I have had compliments on this jacket on me.  I did not take pictures of the heather blue one but the fit is the same.  I also washed these in cold water, delicate dry with no shrinkage or seam puckering.  They had a very slight dye odor and the wash took care of that.  The picture is after it was washed.  I must say the brown buffalo print in 3x that I initially ordered seemed to be a little lighter weight so don't know if there is a difference in colors ordered but the 2 I got were as expected.

date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024
content: So these are super nice however in the 3 pack of the solid ones the largest is too wide to be comfortable and stiff! I couldn’t adjust it without pliers…. Then I got it too tight on my toe and it’s too fat rubbing the other toes. Then I scratched it up taking it off so now it’s all bent up and scratched so I probably can’t send it back but I like the other two. I have a swollen toe and two broken fingernails from this ordeal and I’m not the type to get myself stuck like that so use caution. That being said if it fits you well it will probably be indestructible.

author: Minnie Love
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
content: I recently purchased the Amazon Aware Unisex Kids and Toddlers' Recycled Polyester Long Sleeve Puffer Jacket, and I am extremely happy with my purchase. This is a fantastic product that is both stylish and functional, and it is made from high-quality materials that are environmentally friendly.The jacket is made from recycled polyester, which is a great choice for anyone who wants to reduce their environmental footprint. The material is also soft, lightweight, and comfortable to wear, making it perfect for kids and toddlers.The jacket is well-designed, with long sleeves and a puffer-style construction that provides excellent warmth and insulation. It also features a hood that is both adjustable and detachable, which is a great feature for kids who want to customize their look.Overall, I am very impressed with the Amazon Aware Unisex Kids and Toddlers' Recycled Polyester Long Sleeve Puffer Jacket. It is a high-quality product that is well-made, functional, and stylish, and it is a great choice for parents who want to make a positive impact on the environment while still providing their kids with a warm and comfortable jacket.

author: Nora
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
content: This is a cute puffer coat. I got as a coat for next year for my 5 year old and the small looks like it should be just the right size for next winter, possibly longer. It seems very warm and is a bright pink. It's well constructed and has some nice pockets.One thing to note is that this coat is really puffy. It's good for wearing outside when it's cold or for playing in the snow but it will be way too big for use in a harnessed car seat.Although it's not the cheapest kids' winter coat, it does seem solidly built and has the added benefit of being climate friendly which makes up for the price tag a bit.

date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
content: This is a great quality made little girls jacket. I ordered this in size 6 to 7 in the color pink. The outside fabric is a good thickness and made from good quality material. It is somewhat smooth so it will help prevent getting chilled from the wind. The stitching is also very well done I believe this check would last for years. The stuffing is what I think is the best part. It is thicker than other jackets and the packing is more solid and insulating. The design is also modern and nature making for a great look.

author: Nora
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
content: This is a cute puffer coat. I got as a coat for next year for my 5 year old and the small looks like it should be just the right size for next winter, possibly longer. It seems very warm and is a bright pink. It's well constructed and has some nice pockets.One thing to note is that this coat is really puffy. It's good for wearing outside when it's cold or for playing in the snow but it will be way too big for use in a harnessed car seat.Although it's not the cheapest kids' winter coat, it does seem solidly built and has the added benefit of being climate friendly which makes up for the price tag a bit.

author: KW
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
content: I wanted to try some bracelets that are a little more current.  The set comes with 3 bracelets that you can wear together or independently.  The one is dislike the most is the chain: it is the least realistic (it doesn't look at all real) and it doesn't "go together" as nicely as the other two.  (It also kinks a little.) Therefore, I have put on the knot and the cuff (and the chain is still in the box).  The 2 work together and look decent.  What I don't love is that the cuff has hard edges and doesn't feel comfortable next to your skin.  So I end up taking off the cuff because of comfort, not the looks.  In sum, they are a good price point, they are decent, but I wish the chain looked more real and the cuff had softer edges.

content: These are so nice.  They are the perfect size for little ears.  Often, I can't wear hoops because of the weight, but these are small and light. author: Golden Doll
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
content: I love anklets! I wear anywhere from two to five solid gold anklets, and have been thinking about getting more solid gold bracelets for my other ankle.  I saw the Gokeey Ankle Bracelets, and decided to get them to see how I like having multiple anklets on both ankles, or if I will stick to wearing several on only one ankle.  I prefer solid gold, but before buying more 100% gold anklets, I have been trying these. I was also curious about whether or not they would tarnish, as the product description states, which is something I don’t have to worry about with my jewelry. I can tell differences between my solid gold jewelry and these anklets, but thy do look great and shiny and seem solid.  They are beautiful on! I use the links to close some of them at various lengths, so that the detail is seen on each anklet. I do not take my jewelry off, and, as I test these, I have been keeping them on as if they were my genuine solid gold.  They are so dainty!So far, there has been no change in color.  I can tell that they are plated gold, and the color is slightly different, but they do look lovely, and will be a great less expensive option for those in the market, especially if they don’t change colors.  As always, I will update here if anything changes with them.I hope this is helpful!  Enjoy!

content: Nice set of ankle chains, but the packing of them all tossed into a small square plastic frame provided some tedious untangling. author: Finch
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
content: These earrings came in a nice little box that I'm saving for travel! It's simple and handy. The earrings are a nice weight and luster, and each earring is stamped with its S925 mark. They look and feel like real silver and are fairly attractive in design, although from the side you do see the hinge, which is located at the bottom of the earring.Unfortunately, I'm only able to comfortably wear one of the four sets of earrings, maybe two with some brief discomfort. You can see in the photographs that my ears are red from the struggle of getting these earrings in, and the smaller earring in the photos isn't even from the smallest set - it's from the second-smallest and I could barely get it on.This is down to both the size and the design. In size, the smallest earrings would only fit a child, someone with petite ears / narrow earlobes, or someone with a piercing in a less fleshy location than the ear lobe. In design, this problem is made worse. The bottom-hinged design means that the wire that goes through your ear curves as part of the circle. The smaller the earring, the tighter the curve, so with the smallest earrings, the wire pushes into the inside flesh of your piercing instead of straight through it.Even once you've got the wire through, it's still awkward; you have to close the earring carefully to line up the slightly hooked end of the wire with the portion of the earring it should gently snap into. This is frustrating to do with tiny parts that are behind your ear.Overall, I'm bummed. I love the look of the metal, but I can't wear most of these earrings. Time to find someone with tiny ears and a lot of patience to gift the three smaller sets to.

author: Viki T.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
content: In this set of four pairs, half the individual pieces I received have either bent ear wires, loose hinges or poorly closing catches. So, not the best quality in my opinion. They have a bright and shiny finish and I like the style of hinged hoops with the look of graduated sizes but the pictures look nicer than they do in hand. I have nine piercings in my ears and I wear old-school graduated hoops that I have to open sideways with small pliers so I rarely change them because of the effort. I thought these would offer more convenience and ease to switch things out or even string dangles via eyelet on them but they’re a bit thick and several are faulty. The picture shows the thickness of the hoop. The ear wire is around 0.9mm or 19ga, so also a bit thicker than you might be used to (standard being 20-21ga.)

date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2024
content: I LOVE these hoops! The size range is really nice and perfect for a hoop stack.I've worn these for about 6 months now with almost no issues. No tarnish on the smaller 3 pair, but the big pair turned silver after almost two days. It could be because it's in my helix, but I find it hard to believe that my helix piercing ate through the outer layer of metal, much less that it happened in two days. Lucky for me, I mix metals. It also happens to be that the larger pair of hoops come unclasped the most. Maybe I got a pair of duds. The smaller 3 pair are perfect and exactly what I was looking for.--Please note that the large hoops in my lobe are not from this package, they are Lucky Brand.I shower in them, sleep in them, and never take them out. AMAZING for the price. Will order again if needed, but these are holding up well. They ship in a funky little case, but it's very durable.

author: ForeverSmiling
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
content: I don't change earrings often. I like reasonably sized hoops that I can sleep in, wear in the shower, swim in, etc. Unfortunately, many earrings that claim they won't change color will eventually do just that. So far, these have lived up to the claim and have not changed at all. They are sterling silver with a white gold overlay. They even have the 925 sterling silver inscribed in the hoops. They are easy to put in since they have a hidden hinge at the bottom, and so far, they haven't fallen out even though I wear them all the time. I don't have sensitive ears/skin, but these earrings are supposed to also be hypoallergenic. They come in a container that can be used for ongoing storage if you don't wear all of them at once. My only complaint is that the inscribed 925 sterling silver indicator is on the same side of all the earrings, so you can see it on the outside of the left earring if you wear it normally. As an easy fix, I insert the left earring from the back of my ear to the front, so I'm technically wearing it backward, but that ensures the inscription is on the inside facing my neck and isn't visible when looking at me.

author: Jerry B
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
content: I recently ordered a set of bracelets for my daughter, attracted by the diverse styles each chain promised. Unfortunately, my experience has been somewhat disappointing. Upon arrival, I noticed three of the bracelets were significantly larger than anticipated, which was a letdown as I likely wouldn't wear them due to their size.Opting for the smaller, more delicate bracelets, I combined them for a more subtle look. However, my initial satisfaction was short-lived when one of the bracelets broke, losing a jump ring. Although it's a fixable issue, this incident has raised concerns about the overall durability of these bracelets.While I appreciated the variety in styles, the inconsistency in sizing and the questionable durability have left me feeling uncertain about the value of this purchase. The bracelets have charm, but the quality seems lacking, which is a critical factor for repeated use and enjoyment.

author: FrankieDoll
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
content: This set of Seven 14k Gold-Plated Bracelets from GoKeey are all unique and quite pretty. They are gold-plated, so I won't expect the gold to keep its luster for too long, but I will do my best to take care of them so that the gold color lasts longer. The bracelets are all different styles including Paperclip, Rope, Cuban, Herringbone and Figaro Links, among others. They look good together, stacked on one wrist, but I usually just wear 2 or 3 on each wrist. They look good next to my silver watch, as I love the mixed metals look.These clasps are quite small, as the bracelets are all pretty thin and delicate themselves , so they can be a bit tricky to clasp.The price point of these 7 bracelets is really good at a little over $2 per bracelet, and so far, I have had no issues with breakage or faulty clasps. Even though these are just gold-plated, they look believable and I am impressed with the quality. These are a perfect fit for me at about a 7" to 8" average length. I hope my review is helpful for you.

content: Ever since I got my ears peirced over a year ago I have had trouble with reacting to any earrings except the silver studs I was peirced with. author: mishqueen
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
content: I tried the stainless steel set and the gold plated set, with the same results. I am returning them.PROS:Very pretty and nice sizes, super shiny!Super easy to snap on and off, compared to ones I've had in the pastCONS:I have a nickel allergy, and my piercings swelled up immediately after putting these in. I gave them an overnight test because I thought maybe it was just the larger curved posts causing temporary irritation. But in the morning I had puss coming out, which means the earrings have nickel in them. After I took them out, my holes sealed shut (a sure sign of blistering where the posts inserted). Y'all are lucky that my nickel testing kit can't get here fast enough to chemically prove they have nickel in them. But I will have it for the next time I try something.The posts are thick. If you have thin and straight holes, you'll have to shove them through forcibly.Depends:If you are looking for dainty, barely-there teeny hoops, these are not the droids you're looking for. They are blingy and obvious. But if that's what you were hoping for, you are in luck!

date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
content: I consider these to be casual earrings which can be worn with anything.  They are certainly worth the $11 price tag, but if the price increases, I might think twice.  Sometimes I have a bit of difficulty closing the earrings.  They don't always want to snap shut without fussing with them a little bit.  Also, I read in other reviews that people really loved the packaging; I don't.  The online photos of the package appear larger than it actually is, however, that's not the problem.  The earrings are not secured in the "box", so when I opened the box, some of the earrings fell out and onto the floor.  I suggest you open the box when you're at a table.All in all, they're certainly worth the price, and would also make a nice gift.

I work with my hands, and have had this tail get in the way. Also, the tails tangle, so stacking isn't an option.

These are so great for the price! Very structurally sound, shiny, and the Percy sizes! The packaging is also really clever! I actually used the packaging for a few flower buds i wanted to keep forever, but this is genius if you travel or if you just want to stay organized. They come in a reusable clear holding case kind of like a shadow box but the material holds them in place so they don't tangle our move around. I'm not sure about wear and tear yet as I just received these today, but I do hope they are truly waterproof as the listing states. I weep update if anything occurs with that.

content: Growing up in the 80s, I have had a total of 6 piercings at different times, so not all of them are equally measured and spaced. And back then, we wore heavy  earrings so many earrings just hang and drag. As I’ve gotten older, simple, light hoops look the best. I have been searching for this size and sparkle and weight for years! The search is over! You’ve got to get these hoops!

author: Crystal
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
content: These look cheap. On costume jewelry, it is easy to tell where the prongs meet the gem… there is less shimmer and overall just kind of looks… muddled, I suppose would be the best description.Other than that, these are OK. They clip together nicely, so there is no question whether or not they are closed. The sides look to be much higher quality than the area where the stones are set—so that’s a positive.I don’t love these, I’ve been wearing the 6mm in my cartilage piercing and it hasn’t caused any irritation, so that’s a plus.The item description did NOT have the listed base metal (925/Sterling) listed, just that these are gold plated. It was difficult to find this information… I think these would sell better if this information was included in this area. I am incredibly allergic to all cheaper metals and break out in hives (so this is something I look at FIRST).For the price, the pack of these is a great deal. Overall, these are just OK for earrings—if someone isn’t super close to look at the details/quality of them.

content: UPDATE: I am very pleased with this seller. They have done everything they can to find out why I was dissatisfied and to rectify the issue. My issue lies with Amazon and not the seller. Amazon won't ship the correct item even though the packaging is clearly labeled with the sizes of earrings. (This has also happened with other products I've ordered several times, I think Amazon staff need to pay more attention when packaging items to ship.) If I need a larger size in the future, I will definitely order from this company as the product itself was good quality and the company is very helpful.ORIGINAL REVIEW: The quality of the earrings seemed good and they were easy to open and close, however I ordered the 8mm size and received the 10mm set. Unfortunately they looked much bigger than what I was looking for so I tried to exchange them for the 8mm set again like I originally ordered, but I received the 10mm set the second time as well. Since this is not what I wanted or ordered I did end up returning them. Other than the issue with receiving the wrong size I think the earrings themselves are good.

My ears weren’t irritated at all until then.Original review: Perfect size and material. I usually have to look for earrings labeled—for sensitive ears, if I wear fake or cheap earrings my ears get really red and sore. I have had no problems with these. I cleaned them and put them in a month or two ago and haven’t taken them out since. They don’t even feel like they’re there. I love the size and would buy a smaller size for a third hole if I still had it.

content: I recently purchased the Gokeey Small Gold Huggie Hoop Earrings Set, and I am thrilled with the stylish and comfortable addition to my jewelry collection.The gold plating gives these hoops a rich and authentic appearance without the hefty price tag. They have become a favorite in my collection, and I highly recommend them for anyone seeking stylish, hypoallergenic, and lightweight earrings.My only complaint is that the clasp on one of them becomes loose easily, so I would suggest to take them out when you sleep.

content: Sorry I just got off work so I’m looking pretty beat in these, but I got them all one size which was the smaller size. It is SO hard to find just three smaller size hoops that are all one size. It’s like, am I the only one who just wants basic size earrings for my piercings? WELL. After going to three shops, returning an Amazon order and getting some other goofy larger ones which were small, medium and large, I found these!! They are exactly what I was looking for. I haven’t slept on them yet but I’m planning to tonight (as you can see in the photos it will prob happen within the next 15 min) but I’m very happy with them. The clasp seems like it will be stable, clips strong and great color. Hoping it won’t turn green as I’m planning to wear them a while as my stable pair for work, chillin etc without feeling like I’m wearing earrings. I’m looking forward to it, will update shortly how they feel when I sleep cuz I’m hoping I don’t feel them. I’m glad I found this one small size in three pairs!

author: Shalomae's Must Have's
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
content: I got my 2 piercings on each ear a year ago. And they weren’t healing, getting infected and even started getting keloids. And I realized it was because they (Claire’s) had nickel in them. The SECOND, I replaced them with these hoops my ears stopped itching. They are very easy to put in, which the Claire’s hoops took me 30 minutes each for one earring. Great for sleeping, I will say for the largest hoop take out for bed if you’re a somersault sleeper like me. My ears are a little tender. But if you’re a sleeping beauty you shouldn’t have a problem.The last photo are the Claire’s earrings. They used to be bright silver, after 6 months they are black now. One actually snapped inside my ear it was so tarnished. Some of them I had to clip off with nail clippers because it wouldn’t even stretch open anymore. I don’t recommend getting any sort of hoops like Claire’s. Get these that open in half (don’t have to do any bending or stretching), time saver and looks way better.*Not a paid review, just me being honest so you don’t have to go through what I did*UPDATE: was able to start sleeping with big hoop in no problem. My ears haven’t been itchy since. One of the largest hoops would clasp very loosely. You just have to gently lift the post until it clicks in perfectly again!!

content: I recently purchased the Gokeey Small Gold Huggie Hoop Earrings Set, and I am thrilled with the stylish and comfortable addition to my jewelry collection.The gold plating gives these hoops a rich and authentic appearance without the hefty price tag. The hypoallergenic material also makes them ideal for those with sensitive ears. I can confidently say that these earrings live up to their claim of being lightweight and suitable for everyday wear.The set offers variety with different hoop sizes, allowing for easy mix-and-match to suit various occasions or piercings. After wearing them consistently, I have experienced no irritation or discomfort, a testament to their quality and suitability for sensitive ears. They have become a favorite in my collection, and I highly recommend them for anyone seeking stylish, hypoallergenic, and lightweight earrings.My only complaint is that the clasp on one of them becomes loose easily, so I would suggest to take them out when you sleep.

author: Amazolex
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
content: Sorry I just got off work so I’m looking pretty beat in these, but I got them all one size which was the smaller size. It is SO hard to find just three smaller size hoops that are all one size. It’s like, am I the only one who just wants basic size earrings for my piercings? WELL. After going to three shops, returning an Amazon order and getting some other goofy larger ones which were small, medium and large, I found these!! They are exactly what I was looking for. I haven’t slept on them yet but I’m planning to tonight (as you can see in the photos it will prob happen within the next 15 min) but I’m very happy with them. The clasp seems like it will be stable, clips strong and great color. Hoping it won’t turn green as I’m planning to wear them a while as my stable pair for work, chillin etc without feeling like I’m wearing earrings. I’m looking forward to it, will update shortly how they feel when I sleep cuz I’m hoping I don’t feel them. I’m glad I found this one small size in three pairs!

author: Shalomae's Must Have's
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
content: I got my 2 piercings on each ear a year ago. And they weren’t healing, getting infected and even started getting keloids. And I realized it was because they (Claire’s) had nickel in them. The SECOND, I replaced them with these hoops my ears stopped itching. They are very easy to put in, which the Claire’s hoops took me 30 minutes each for one earring. Great for sleeping, I will say for the largest hoop take out for bed if you’re a somersault sleeper like me. My ears are a little tender. But if you’re a sleeping beauty you shouldn’t have a problem.The last photo are the Claire’s earrings. They used to be bright silver, after 6 months they are black now. One actually snapped inside my ear it was so tarnished. Some of them I had to clip off with nail clippers because it wouldn’t even stretch open anymore. I don’t recommend getting any sort of hoops like Claire’s. Get these that open in half (don’t have to do any bending or stretching), time saver and looks way better.*Not a paid review, just me being honest so you don’t have to go through what I did*UPDATE: was able to start sleeping with big hoop in no problem. My ears haven’t been itchy since. One of the largest hoops would clasp very loosely. You just have to gently lift the post until it clicks in perfectly again!!

author: Effy
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
content: I’m super allergic to metals & such that are not 14k gold, but I gave these a chance. I am AMAZED. I never take these earrings out. I sleep with them in, work with them in, hike 16 miles with them in and they never fell out. Only time these come loose is when I’m toweling my hair out of the shower super rough. No allergy!!! Not a single itch and that includes my new piercings. They click shut perfectly and aren’t easy to knock out. I’m aiming for a full stacked hoop ear up my cartilage and this has me feeling like I’m getting there. I cannot stress this enough: GET THESE EARRINGS. I’m gonna buy like 8 more of these. The price is undeniably good.
